## Workspace.removeTopBlock() method

Removes a block from the list of top blocks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeTopBlock(block: Block): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Block to remove. |

**Returns:**
